name: Moonlight Blade
description:
Moonlight Blade is an MMORPG developed by Aurora Studios under the direction of Tencent Games. You will plunge into a huge world of Chinese fantasy. The world is divided into separate large regions. According to the developers, it's 18 times bigger than the world of Skyrim. There are 17 different landscapes and more than 2 thousand kinds of plants in Moonlight.

Combat system pleases you with elements of oriental martial arts, that was created together with real masters of martial arts. You will be able to choose the control system according to your taste: non-target or target. There are 8 fighting schools (classes) in the game: Taibai/Taebaek, Shenwei/Deity, ShenDao/Shindo, TianXiang/Shin, Zhenwu/Jumu, Five Venom/Misreading, Beggars/Opening, TangMen/Dangmun.
